content:
trying to map
Goals from CCDA to FHIR
CCDA Plan of Treatment to FHIR CarePlan
CCDA Implants / Medical Equipment to FHIR Implantable Device

is there an existing kind of dictionary for this mapping?

@Lital Inghel we haven't worked out mapping for Goals yet, but it is on our radar to do that in the C-CDA to US Core Mapping Project. You can follow our progress here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGP/C-CDA+to+and+from+US+Core+Mapping
